summary: Test suite times out on first run when SDK download takes longer than test framework timeout (2s default), with no informational message about the download. On slow/proxied connections, the download can fail or get corrupted, leaving a confusing temp file and timeout error.
userImpact: Users running tests for the first time on slow or proxied connections experience unexplained test timeouts and SDK download failures, blocking their test suite.
rootCause: SDK download happens silently in the background with a 20s timeout, but test frameworks default to 2s timeout, causing tests to fail before download completes. No logging about the download process.
proposedFix: Trigger an informational message when SDK download is required, and potentially increase test timeout handling or improve download progress feedback.
workaround: Increase Jest/Mocha timeout to >20s to allow the download to complete.
keyQuote: Failed to start ephemeral server: Temp download file at /var/folders/3w/4_q0ch0n763141t1zb61z_z80000gn/T/temporal-sdk-typescript-1.11.7.downloading not complete after 20 seconds.
